H0.text: where do the elves go on the boat in lord of the rings. Tol Eressëa

H1.text: where do the elves go on the boat in lord of the rings. Aman

H2.text: where do the elves go on the boat in lord of the rings. Alqualondë

H3.text: where do the elves go on the boat in lord of the rings. Valinor

A4.text: Gradually some of the immortal and ageless Elves are allowed to live there as well, sailing across the ocean to the West.

A5.text: The Elves can go to Valinor only by the Straight Road and in ships capable of passing out of the spheres of the earth.
